name: Craniux: Post- Mortem
description:
Prepare to embark on an RPG of a lifetime... or maybe after your lifetime (get it, cause you are already dead... ah bad joke.)

this game includes:

-over 25 weapons, 25 armor pieces, 30 enemies, 10 items, 15 spells (ahh the list goes on and on!)

-a narrator that won't shut up (and is kind of an asshat )

-a bunch of bone puns 

-a weird boss

So what are you waiting for? Play it today and die again!

(the controls are simple, majority of it is clicking unless stated otherwise)
